title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
